definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: This is the French unique humanities landscape, full of poetic.
sentences.chinese: 这是法国独特的人文景观，充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: Where lies the poetry of CUHK?
sentences.chinese: 中大最诗情画意的地方在哪里？

sentences.english: Picturesque English landscapes began as pastures.
sentences.chinese: 诗情画意的英式景观始于草场。

sentences.english: Is black and white photos no more romantic, but also reveals the poetic.
sentences.chinese: 虽是黑白照片没有多的浪漫色彩，但也显诗情画意。

sentences.english: Rafting roaming and saw a reflection of the lake-green water lake, full of poetic.
sentences.chinese: 泛舟漫游，只见一湖绿水半湖倒影，充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: Rural the poetics picture meaning like is in of Zhu Teng in braiding, reflect incisively and vividly.
sentences.chinese: 田园般的诗情画意在竹藤的编织中体现得淋漓尽致。

sentences.english: His artistic style is elegant and simple, full of poetic charm.
sentences.chinese: 他的艺术格调清丽简约，雅俗之间，充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: In Crouching Tiger, that motion has its own poetry.
sentences.chinese: 在《卧虎藏龙》中，这场打斗充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: I  rejoice with you and wish you a long and happy meaningful life.
sentences.chinese: 我跟你一起高兴，祝你健康长寿，生活充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: There is a house idyllically set in wooded grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个诗情画意般的林荫中的房子。

sentences.english: Tell yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches.
sentences.chinese: 告诉自己你不够诗情画意招不来生活的丰富多彩。

sentences.english: Autumn scenery is undoubtedly of the most poetic and picturesque charm.
sentences.chinese: 秋景是最富有诗情画意的。
她的舞姿袅娜，富有诗情画意。

definition: poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu
